mapper.sql: select id, dicttype_id, dicttype_name, create_time, op_time, del_flag from sys_dict_type
mapper.update: update sys_dict_type set dicttype_id = #{dicttypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dicttype_name = #{dicttypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, op_time = #{opTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
WHERE del_flag = '0'
AND dicttype_id like CONCAT('%', #{dicttypeId}, '%')
AND dicttype_name like CONCAT('%', #{dicttypeName}, '%')
ORDER BY create_time
mapper.update: update sys_dict_type set del_flag = '1' where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT sde.id, sde.dicttype_id AS dicttypeId, sde.dict_id AS dictId, sde.dict_name AS dictName, sde.status, sde.sort, sde.create_time AS createTime, sde.op_time AS opTime, sde.del_flag AS delFlag FROM sys_dict_type sdt INNER JOIN sys_dict_entry sde ON sde.dicttype_id = sdt.dicttype_id WHERE sde.del_flag = '0' AND sdt.id = #{id}
